author: Simon Difford
description: There's an interesting play between rum, vermouth and grapefruit which, with the right grapefruit, can be delicious.  (Juice ripe pink or red grapefruit.)
name: Isla de Piño
recipeIngredient: 45 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass

video.description: There's an interesting play between rum, vermouth and grapefruit which, with the right grapefruit, can be delicious.  (Juice ripe pink or red grapefruit.)
video.name: HOWTO make Isla de Piño
